fields.description: Assorted selection of 10 cotton fabric covered metal buttons. Wash at 40 degrees. 8 pieces. Size: 9mm.

fields.description: Assorted selection of 10 cotton fabric covered metal buttons. Wash at 40 degrees. 8 pieces. Size: 9mm.

fields.name: Grey Gutermann Natural Cotton Thread 100m
fields.description: Fine but strong with a silk-like lustre. For those who prefer to sew with natural fibres. Suitable for hand and machine sewing. Applications: lock and step seams, overlock and safety seams, underwear, buttonholes, sewing on buttons, ornamental stitches and decorative seams. Soft and supple. Tear and abrasion resistant. Elastic and extendible. Light-resistant and colour-fast. Recommended needle and size: Universal, size 60 - 80. 100% mercerised cotton.

fields.description: Assorted selection of 10 cotton fabric covered metal buttons. Wash at 40 degrees. 8 pieces. Size: 9mm.

fields.name: Sewing By Heart by Tone Finnanger
fields.description:
Sewing By Heart is a heartfelt sewing book from the creator of Tilda, Tone Finnanger.

In this glorious celebration of her love of fabric, you'll find over 20 sewing, patchwork, appliqué and quilting projects that will bring colour and beauty to your home. 

Projects include stunning quilts, pretty pillows, sophisticated soft toys, and beautiful accessories such as pincushions, pumpkins, flowers, stockings and more - all designed with characteristic Tilda charm. 

Featuring gorgeous photography, in-depth instructions and full-size templates, you'll soon be sewing by heart.

fields.name: Tilda's Fairy Tale Wonderland Tone Finnanger
fields.description: A beautiful collection of seasonal quirky projects. Each chapter is themed on a classic children's story such as Pinocchio, Bambi, The Nutcracker and The Princess and The Pea. Projects include various doll designs, as well as gifts and decorations.

fields.name: Crafting Tilda's Friends by Tone Finnanger
fields.description: A whimsical collection of 30 sewing and paper craft projects including garden angels, wreaths/garlands, pincushions; apply motifs to cushions, table mats, coasters, blankets and bags - as well as stencilling to create fun signs and picture frames.

fields.name: Madeira Embroidery Stork Style Scissors Gold Plated 9cm
fields.description: Perfect for all types of needlework. Madeira Quality Embroidery Scissors in the attractive stork-design. Comfortable, easy to handle and perfect for all types of needlework. Highest precision cut to the very point of the blade. Gold plated, nickel-free coating is kind to skin.

fields.name: Madeira Thread Snips
fields.description: Madeira Quality Thread Snips with comfort handle.

fields.name: Madeira Applique Scissors 15cm
fields.description: Precision scissors for applique, trimming and quilt work. The double curved handle and shaped ?bill? prevents fabric or applique damage whilst allowing a close, controlled cut. 6in/15.24cm

fields.name: Madeira Double Curved Embroidery Scissors Gold Plated 9cm
fields.description: Raised finger loops keep hands away from fabric and allow easy cutting where it is difficult to reach, even under the presser foot. Double curved scissors reach easily over any hand or machine hoop and cut threads closely and precisely without harming the fabric. Lightweight and easy to pick up. 9cm/3.5in.

fields.name: Olfa Rotary Cutter 60mm
fields.description: There's no reason to struggle cutting through multiple layers; it's hard on the material and hard on you. This Olfa rotary cutter is ideal for medium to heavy-duty projects. It can accommodate up to eight layers of material.

fields.name: Olfa Quick Change Rotary Cutter 45mm
fields.description: The 45mm Quick-Change Rotary Cutter a rolling razor blade used to cut materials into shapes, strips and pieces for craft projects. The Quick-Change Rotary Cutter has an easy blade change with just a single click. No more assembly with a washer and a nut. Just slide the locking mechanism and the blade immediately releases. The innovative spilt blade cover allows for switching hands effortlessly without reassembly and offers extra safety protection while cutting. Each side slides back and forth independently so the user can easily switch hands to cut. The blade is made of high quality tungsten carbide tool steel for unparalleled sharpness and superior edge retention. Designed for both right-and left-handed use.

fields.name: Olfa Rotary Cutter 28mm
fields.description: Perfect for detailed and intricate cutting. Use with quilting and patchwork templates.

fields.name: Olfa Rotary Cutter Chenille-Textile
fields.description: For making your own chenille at home, the cutter has four "feet" serving as channel guides that create chenille in several styles of widths, from narrow to wide, for a variety of creations. Its premium-quality blade provides superior sharpness and durability.

fields.name: Clover Rotary Cutter Soft Cushion 18mm
fields.description: Clover's Soft Touch Cushion Handle rotary cutter cuts fabric beautifully with just the right amount of blade exposed, whether held upright or at an angle. Can be used by both left and right handed people.

fields.name: Clover Rotary Cutter Soft Cushion 28mm
fields.description: Clover's Soft Touch Cushion Handle rotary cutter cuts fabric beautifully with just the right amount of blade exposed, whether held upright or at an angle. Can be used by both left and right handed people.

fields.name: Clover Rotary Cutter Soft Cushion 45mm
fields.description: Clover's Soft Touch Cushion Handle rotary cutter cuts fabric beautifully with just the right amount of blade exposed, whether held upright or at an angle. Can be used by both left and right handed people.

fields.name: Clover Rotary Cutter Soft Cushion 60mm
fields.description: Clover's Soft Touch Cushion Handle rotary cutter cuts fabric beautifully with just the right amount of blade exposed, whether held upright or at an angle. Can be used by both left and right handed people.

fields.name: Pink Rotary Cutting Mat 60x45cm
fields.description: Olfa self-healing rotary mat in pink. It not only protects your cutting surfaces, it protects the edges of rotary blades. The mat's grid lines are designed for easy measuring and accurate cutting of straight lines and precise angles. Double sided, inch and centimetres.

fields.name: Hemline Gold Cutting Mat Medium 45 x 30cm
fields.description: Double-sided cutting mat with metric measurements on one side and imperial measurements on the other. 3mm thick with self-healing properties. Matte non-slip surface. Easy-to-read measurements in gold print with 30, 45, 60 and 90 degree angle lines. Wipe clean only. Dimensions: 45 x 30cm.

fields.name: Cutting Mat: Rotating: 12 x 12inch
fields.description: No need to rotate the project - rotate the mat! This self-healing mat rotates so that you don't have to. It has a non-slip stationary bottom layer and an interlocking cutting mat that rotates 360 degrees. Use the mat to make squares, triangles, diamonds, circles or any shape which requires turning. The mat is marked with angles and imperial measurements. Also ideal for card making, painting and many other crafts.

fields.name: Olfa Aqua Cutting Mat 42.5 x 30cm
fields.description: Whether you're new to crafting or a pro, you'll appreciate this self-healing rotary mat. It not only protects your cutting surfaces, it protects the edges of rotary blades. The mat's grid lines are designed for easy measuring and accurate cutting of straight lines and precise angles. Double-sided, inch and centimetres.

fields.name: Hemline Needle Threader Hummingbird
fields.description: For hand needles with blade to cut thread.

fields.name: Clover Hand Sewing Tapestry Needles Gold Eye
fields.description: 6 needle pack. Superior sewing needles go through fabric smoothly without straining or stress. Unique, pure gold plate elliptical eye is helpful for threading. Nickel plated tip for smooth sewing. Durable and bend resistant.

fields.name: Clover Hand Sewing Needles Sashico
fields.description: 8 needles / pack. 4 different sizes. Superior sewing needles go through fabric smoothly without straining or stress. Unique, pure gold plate elliptical eye is helpful for threading. Nickel plated tip for smooth sewing. Durable and bend resistant.

fields.name: Clover Hand Sewing Needles Huck Embroidery
fields.description: 3 needles per pack. Superior sewing needles go through fabric smoothly without straining or stress. Unique, pure gold plate elliptical eye is helpful for threading. Nickel plated tip for smooth sewing. Durable and bend resistant. The tip is rounded and curved so cloth can be easily scooped.

fields.name: Hemline Pen Fabric Marker Vanishing
fields.description: Clearly marks lines and designs for embroidery, quilting, and sewing. No need to remove marks - they will disappear in 48 hours. Excellent for use with fabrics not suitable for washing. If necessary, marks can be removed with a damp cloth, or by rinsing in cold water.

fields.name: Clover Fabric Marker Fine Pen White
fields.description: 1 piece / pack. White marker for easy to see marking on dark coloured fabrics. Marks disappear upon ironing or spraying with water. As the ink dries on the fabric, white markings will become more visible.

fields.name: Clover Bamboo Marking Pins
fields.description: Use these bamboo marking pins to hold sections together when joining seams. The natural texture of the bamboo keeps the pin from sliding out. 10 long pins for thick knitted fabrics. Tip is shaped to prevent the needle from piercing through the yarn.

fields.name: Clover Fine Quilting Pins
fields.description: 100 pins / pack. 0.50 x 48mm. Pins smoothly pass through fabric, as the pin tips are thin and sharp. Long size pins are perfectly suited for quilting.

fields.name: Clover Silk Pins
fields.description: Designed for use with light weight fabrics. 100 pins / pack. 0.5mm diameter, 35mm long.

fields.name: Windy Days Fabric Roll 40 Pieces
fields.description: Pre-cut into handy 2.5 inch (6.35 cm) 40 strips, 2 of each design in the Windy Days collection. Wash at 60 degrees Centigrade. Maximum shrinkage of 3%. Can be tumble dried. Piece size: 6.35 x 110cm. Premium quality, high thread count fabric with OEKO-TEX®, Class 1 certification.

fields.name: Cotton Beach Fabric Roll 40 Pieces
fields.description: Pre-cut into handy 2.5 inch (6.35 cm) 40 strips, 2 of each design in the Cotton Beach collection. Wash at 60 degrees Centigrade. Maximum shrinkage of 3%. Can be tumble dried. Piece size: 6.35 x 110cm. Premium quality, high thread count fabric with OEKO-TEX®, Class 1 certification

fields.name: Hometown Fabric Roll 40 Pieces
fields.description: Pre-cut into handy 2.5 inch (6.35 cm) 40 strips, 2 of each design in the Hometown collection. 100% cotton. Piece size: (l/w) 6.35 x 110cm. Premium quality, high thread count fabric with OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 Class 1. Wash at 60 degrees Centigrade. Maximum shrinkage of 3%. Can be tumble dried.

fields.name: Cotton Beach Fat Quarters Assorted Bundle of 20
fields.description: 10m fabric bolt. 100% cotton. Premium quality, high thread count fabric with OEKO-TEX®, Class 1 certification. Wash at 60 degrees Centigrade. Maximum shrinkage of 3%. Can be tumble dried. Width: 110cm.

fields.description: Medium weight nylon coil zip, ideal for knitwear, baby wear, jackets, cardigans and sportswear that needs to open at the bottom. Size 61cm/24.01in.

fields.name: Vervaco Couture Outfit Making Set Combi Red Blue
fields.description: Kit includes: 1 outfit to sew (made from a stretchy polyester fabric that does not fray, plus the pattern in paper so you can make the outfit again with other fabrics. Fits any 29cm fashion doll. Difficulty level 1 - suitable for ages 7+.

fields.name: Vervaco Couture Outfit Making Set Dolly Butterfly
fields.description: Kit includes: 1 outfit to sew (made from a stretchy polyester fabric that does not fray, plus the pattern in paper so you can make the outfit again with other fabrics. Fits any 29cm fashion doll. Difficulty level 1 - suitable for ages 7+.

fields.name: Vervaco Couture Outfit Making Set Lizzy Pop Art
fields.description: Kit includes: 1 outfit to sew (made from a stretchy polyester fabric that does not fray, plus the pattern in paper so you can make the outfit again with other fabrics. Fits any 29cm fashion doll. Difficulty level 2 - suitable for ages 8+.

fields.name: Tilda Classic Basics Fat Quarters Pack of 6
fields.description: Bundle of 6 cotton fat quarter pieces. 100% cotton. Premium quality, high thread count fabric with OEKO-TEX®, Class 1 certification. Wash at 60 degrees Centigrade. Shrinkage of 3-4%. Fat quarter size: 55 x 50cm.

fields.name: Mez Duet Neon Jeans Upcycling Cushion
fields.description: A fun way to upcycle an old pair of jeans into a new cushion!

fields.name: Trimits Purple Satin Ribbon 50m x 3mm
fields.description: Trimits purple satin ribbon made of 100% Polyester. Washable at 40 degrees centigrade.

fields.name: Trimits Fat Quarter Tartan Fabric Bundle 4 pieces
fields.description: This pack of tartan fat quarters is perfect for making Christmas decorations, trimming stockings and making gifts. The 4 designs coordinate together however, can also be used separately as required. 80% polyester, 20% cotton, washable at 30 degrees. Item size: (w/h) 54 x 45cm.

fields.name: Trimits Monochrome Fat Quarters Fabric Bundle 5 Pieces
fields.description: Pack of 5 cotton fat quarters in a mix of monochrome colours. Can be used together or mixed with other packs in a variety of quilting projects. Great for making face masks. Item size: (w/h) 54 x 45cm. Compositiion: cotton. Wash at 40 degrees.
